column3: Fix any background parameters that are currently free in the model when performing the likelihood scan over extension.
Spatial model use for extension test.
Parameter vector for scan over spatial extent.  If none then the parameter vector will be set from ``width_min``, ``width_max``, and ``width_nstep``.
Maximum value in degrees for the likelihood scan over spatial extent.
Minimum value in degrees for the likelihood scan over spatial extent.
Number of steps for the spatial likelihood scan.
